use_default_username.title: Do you want to use your default Username?
use_default_username.description: Uncheck this box to edit your displayed name in the app.

alt_username.title: Name
alt_username.description: Replaces your username in the notice.

use_Tags.title: Hashtags
use_Tags.description: Do you want to add hashtags to the room subject?

hash_Tags.title: Room hashtags - Optional
hash_Tags.description: Adds customized hashtags to the room subject.

goal_Emoji.title: Room subject emoji
goal_Emoji.description: Change the emoji in the subject line.

goal_Value.title: Goal Price
goal_Value.description: What is the target goal in tokens?

prize_enable.title: Prize for top tipper at end of goal? (Highly Recommended)
prize_enable.description: Check this if you want to give Daddy a prize at the end.

goal_Prize.title: Daddy's Prize
goal_Prize.description: A special Prize for Daddy once the goal is over.

rolling_notif_1.title: Goal Prize Announcement Frequency
rolling_notif_1.description: Send the Goal Prize notice every (x) amount of minutes.

goal_Prize_Txt.title: Goal Prize Text Color
goal_Prize_Txt.description: Goal Prize announcement text color (Default is White)

goal_Prize_BG.title: Goal Prize Background Color
goal_Prize_BG.description: Background color of the goal prize notice. (Default Light Blue)

init_Tip_Value.title: Initial Tip Value
init_Tip_Value.description: This is the minimum amount someone tips to become Daddy.

nearly_There.title: Close Call Threshold
nearly_There.description: Sends  PM " this many tokens or less from taking the crown."

daddy_icon.title: Daddy's icon.
daddy_icon.description: A crown by default. You can copy/paste other icons.

daddy_background.title: Daddy's background color in chat.
daddy_background.description: Default color is Green. Values must be in Hex format.

time_value.title: Frequency of tip notices. (The purple ones.)
time_value.description: Send notice every  (X) amount of minutes.

txt_Color.title: Announcement Text Color
txt_Color.description: Text color of the Announcements. Default is white.

bkg_Color.title: Announcement Background Color
bkg_Color.description: Background color of announcements. Default is black.

session_leader_bg.title: Leaderboard background color.
session_leader_bg.description: Default background color is black. Values must be in Hex format.

session_leader_text.title: Leaderboard text color.
session_leader_text.description: Default text color is white. Values must be in Hex format.

time_session_leader.title: Leaderboard notice frequency.
time_session_leader.description: Display the leaderboard notice every (x) amount of minutes.

thank_You_Daddy.title: Custom thank you message for Daddy, when he tips more!
thank_You_Daddy.description: Sends Daddy a thank you message when he tips more tokens.

thank_you_text.title: Thank You  Text Color
thank_you_text.description: Text color of the thank you message.

thank_you_background.title: Thank You Background Color
thank_you_background.description: Background color of the thank you message.

tip_menu.title: Tip menu
tip_menu.description: Enable the Tip Menu. You'll set this up in your chat.

tipMenu_textColor.title: Tip Menu Text Color
tipMenu_textColor.description: Color of the tip menu text.

tipMenu_bgColor.title: Tip Menu Background Color
tipMenu_bgColor.description: Color of the tip menu background

tip_menu_emoji.title: Tip Menu Emoji
tip_menu_emoji.description: Either copy/paste emoji, or paste a gif like :banana

tip_menu_time.title: Tip Menu Notice Frequency
tip_menu_time.description: Send the Tip Menu Notice every (X) amount of minutes.

menu_gif.title: Tip Menu Gif
menu_gif.description: You can add an extra gif to Tip Menu.

menu_alert_text.title: Tip Menu Alert Text Color
menu_alert_text.description: Text color of the tip menu purchase alert notice.

menu_alert_bg.title: Menu Alert Background Color
menu_alert_bg.description: Background color of the tip menu purchase alert notice.
